This repository currently shows some of the contributions to the weekly TidyTuesday challenge. Each week my aim is to either grow my skills on a existing visualization type or to explorea new package I have come across. 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(slickR) #used to create sideshow
library(here) #help point to each image

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

images <- tibble(
  x = c("test1", "test2"),
  y = c("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Edgar-Zamora/My-Work/master/%23TidyTuesday/Gov%20Spending%20on%20Kids/higered_spending.png",
        "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Edgar-Zamora/My-Work/master/%23TidyTuesday/Moore's%20Law/TidyTuesday_Circuit.jpg"))


```

```{r image_slide, echo=FALSE}

slickR(obj = images$y, height = 500, width = "100%")

```
